review.title: “Unfair Treatment of staff by "Management"”
review.pros: Pros – pretty good benefits, great co-workers
review.cons: Cons – No room for growth, sabotaging managers, work environment is horrible, owners are self absorbed, "management" takes credit for employees concepts, unfair review's, unnecessarily long working hours due to poor management "communication".
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Write concise instructions for all projects to not waste company time and money, give credit where credit is due, take responsibility for your lack of communication.
